Tasks.Task Description: Set up and configure an ExpressRoute circuit to establish a private connection between your on-premises network and Microsoft cloud services.
Configure peering settings for your ExpressRoute circuit to enable connectivity to Microsoft cloud services.

Tasks.Task: Link a VNet to an ExpressRoute circuit
Tasks.Task Description: Connect a virtual network (VNet) to your ExpressRoute circuit to enable private connectivity between your Azure resources and on-premises network.
Set up ExpressRoute FastPath to improve the data path performance between your on-premises network and Azure virtual networks.
Verify your ExpressRoute configuration by checking ARP records and route tables in the Azure portal.

Tasks.Task: Enable ExpressRoute FastPath on the gateway connection
Tasks.Task Description: Enable FastPath on your ExpressRoute gateway connection to optimize the network performance.
Set up Microsoft Peering for your ExpressRoute circuit to enable connectivity to Microsoft services such as Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365.
Use Network Insights and Network Watcher to monitor and troubleshoot your ExpressRoute connection.

Tasks.Task: Customize metrics and create Connection Monitor
Tasks.Task Description: Set up custom metrics and create a Connection Monitor to track the performance and reliability of your ExpressRoute connection.
Review the network design to ensure connectivity between all resources, considering mechanisms like Azure ExpressRoute, public Internet, or private endpoints.
Evaluate network security requirements, including virtual networks, firewalls, and Azure ExpressRoute, to ensure secure data access and movement.

Tasks.Task: Set up a direct interconnection between Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Tasks.Task Description: Create a virtual network and virtual network gateway, and set up the connection between the virtual network gateway and your ExpressRoute circuit.

Tasks.Task: Use ExpressRoute for Azure Migrate projects
Tasks.Task Description: Replicate data over ExpressRoute for Azure Migrate projects with public endpoint connectivity.
Ensure that accelerated networking is enabled for all VMs connecting to Azure Large Instances to optimize performance.
